data: “The first cause, so far as it can be determined, of the existence of this book may be found in the following letter, written by my only married sister, and received by me, Harry Burton, salesman of white goods, bachelor, aged twenty-eight, and received just as I was trying to decide where I should spend a fortnight’s vacation:—”
browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: humour|category: novels|category: american literature
